rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual locations without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment uses factual language without moderate verbs paired with significant scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports facts; lacks explicit calming cues.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports location of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports locations and types of flocks, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports locations of latest cases, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
Factual report of case locations. No explicit framing cues.
